title: Heat transport maintains stable polar temperatures

content.prompt: The polar regions radiate away more heat energy than they receive from the Sun in the course of a year. However, they are prevented from becoming progressively colder each year primarily by the

choices.label: transport of heat through the atmosphere and oceans
concentration of Earth's magnetic field lines at the poles
release of latent heat to the atmosphere when the polar ice caps melt

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
